title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pua Ka ‘Ilima ‘O Kawaihae Cultural Surf Park, Hawaii
content:
Photo submitted by Kevin Angeles, “Mahalo from Pua Ka ‘Ilima ‘O Kawaihae Cultural Surf Park on the Kohala coast of the Big Island Hawaii.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pua Ka ‘Ilima ‘O Kawaihae Cultural Surf Park, Hawaii appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
